dict.string: ClaimsIQ needs camera access to capture photos of property damage for insurance claims.
ClaimsIQ needs photo library access to save and upload claim photos.
ClaimsIQ needs permission to save photos to your photo library.
ClaimsIQ needs your location to tag photos with GPS coordinates and optimize your daily route.
ClaimsIQ needs your location to provide route optimization and location-based services even in the background.
